instance_template: lecture(1..5). topic("AI"). topic("Math"). topic("Physics"). room(1..3). slot("morning"). slot("afternoon").
generator: 1 { topicOf(L, T) : topic(T) } 1 :- lecture(L). 1 { scheduled(L, R, S) : room(R), slot(S) } 1 :- lecture(L).

hard_constraints.description: sanity check: make sure we don't double-book a room by putting two different lectures in the same room and slot.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(L1, R, S), scheduled(L2, R, S), L1 != L2.

hard_constraints.description: Math and Physics are like oil and water; they can't ever share a room, even at different times of the day.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(L1, R, S1), topicOf(L1, "Math"), scheduled(L2, R, S2), topicOf(L2, "Physics").

hard_constraints.description: AI lectures are morning-only stuff, so keep them out of the afternoon slots.
